response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth to you, we propose a special introductory offer of $1,100,000 for this exclusive item. This price represents a significant discount compared to its market value, making it a unique opportunity for you to acquire it at a favorable rate. We are confident that this offer will not only provide you with substantial savings but also enhance your experience with our product. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together and delivering this remarkable product to you.", "product_price": 1100000}
